about.description:
Our coliving-focused apartments are designed to offer an exceptional living experience for working professionals. We provide a vibrant community atmosphere and essential amenities tailored to your needs.

Here’s what sets us apart:

· FULLY FURNISHED with wooden floor and walk-in closet, full-size beds, desks, chairs, lamps, and closets
· Air conditioning: central cooling & heating system
· FREE IN-UNIT washer/dryer
· Wi-Fi access

Community Spaces:
Enjoy the best aspects of coliving with access to communal areas, including a game room, private theater room, storage room, yoga room, and private lounge. These spaces foster a sense of community and provide opportunities for socializing and relaxation after a long day at work.

Private Bedrooms and Bathrooms:  
Indulge in the luxury of having your private bedroom and bathroom, ensuring a peaceful and comfortable environment for relaxation and rejuvenation.

Smart Lock Security:  
Rest assured that your belongings are safe with our smart lock system, providing added peace of mind for you and your valuables.

Our convenient online portal allows you to manage your living experience easily, available 24/7 for rent payments or maintenance requests. Utilities and internet are offered at a flat rate of $115.

Apply now to secure your spot in our modern, fully furnished co-living spaces and experience exceptional living with Tripalink! 1476 W 35th St is an apartment community located in Los Angeles County and the 90018 ZIP Code. about.description:
Welcome to 1539 Beloit Apartments
Experience modern co-living at 1539 Beloit, a newly renovated apartment community located in the heart of Sawtelle. Each unit features brand-new kitchen appliances, in-unit washer and dryer, spacious walk-in closets, and access to a shared rooftop area—perfect for relaxing or spending time with friends.

All co-living rooms are fully furnished and move-in ready, while select whole units may be furnished or unfurnished to match your preferences.

Conveniently located just off Santa Monica Blvd and near the 405 Freeway, 1539 Beloit is only a short drive or direct bus ride to UCLA, making it a great option for students and professionals alike. Enjoy easy access to work, school, and the vibrant local dining scene that Sawtelle and West LA have to offer.

Please note: rental rates, availability, and promotions are subject to change without notice.

about.description:
Welcome to The Hive on Ellendale, the buzzworthy off-campus housing community designed specifically for students attending USC. Our community is all about finding your hive and we've created an environment that fosters a vibrant and enriching living experience.

At The Hive on Ellendale, we understand that choosing the right place to live is essential. That's why we've perfected the art of student living, ensuring that both students and parents are delighted with their decision. As a longstanding legacy community, we have proudly catered to USC students, offering everything they want and need just steps away from their academic pursuits. Our commitment to providing an upscale and inclusive experience sets us apart from other housing options. All of our units are newly renovated with a modern, upscale design.

Discover our newly renovated two-bedroom, two-bathroom floor plans or our recently constructed five-bedroom apartments. Each option comes fully furnished, complete with an entertainment system, and features an all-inclusive utility fee. Our garden-style apartments span three floors and boast a prime location, just one block away from the nearest grocery store and other community amenities.

Living at The Hive on Ellendale isn't just about having a comfortable and stylish space to call your own; it's about building lasting memories and forging connections. Join your fellow residents for a wide array of community events designed to foster a sense of belonging and camaraderie. After a day of classes, you can easily bike or walk home, explore the renowned Natural History Museum of Los Angeles, cheer on a game at the iconic Los Angeles Memorial Coliseum, or take a short trip downtown on the Metro Line for some retail therapy.

Whether you're seeking a shared living experience or a private oasis, The Hive on Ellendale has you covered. With individual leases based on two people sharing a bedroom, our pricing is student-friendly, with limited private rooms available for those desiring extra space. Embrace the vibrant and fulfilling lifestyle that awaits you at The Hive on Ellendale. Come and be a part of our thriving hive today!

Please Note: The pricing listed is for either a shared room or private bedroom, not the entire unit. USC Student Housing - The Hive On Ellendale is an apartment community located in Los Angeles County and the 90007 ZIP Code. This area is served by the Los Angeles Unified attendance zone. about.description:
Discover stress-free co-living at Ostel’s South Central location, where comfort, community, and convenience come together in the heart of Los Angeles. Our fully furnished shared bedrooms are designed for students, professionals, and international residents who want more than just a place to sleep—they want a place to belong.

Choose from thoughtfully designed layouts, including 2-person and 3-person shared rooms with ensuite or shared bathrooms, walk-in closets, built-in storage, and even private balconies in select units. Each space balances affordability with modern finishes, ensuring you’ll feel at home from day one.

At Ostel, everything you need is included: all utilities, high-speed Wi-Fi, weekly housekeeping, modern furnishings, on-site laundry, and access to relaxing lounges and balconies. We keep it simple—no credit check, no deposit, no SSN required. A one-time $200 reservation fee secures your bed and guarantees month-to-month flexibility.

Ostel places you minutes from USC, Exposition Park, Downtown LA, public transportation, cafés, restaurants, and some of the city’s most dynamic neighborhoods. Whether you’re studying, working, or exploring, our central location puts everything within reach.

With rooms starting at just $750 per month per bed, availability goes quickly. Schedule a tour, reserve online, or contact us today to secure your spot at Ostel—where LA living is made simple, stylish, and stress-free.

about.description:
Check out Haven and apply online at haven coliving

Haven provides an engaging place to live, and a community which unites people with common passion for health and wellness, who are seeking growth, enrichment, and a sense of connection. We afford our Members the opportunity to further themselves, their personal interests and their careers in the locales they desire.

Don't want to pay $$$ for a crappy and lonely studio? Rather focus on your career and well-being instead of working around the clock just to cover the rent?

Network and collaborate by living with others who share the same goals, while saving money and making a ton of new friends.

Stay one month, or a whole year!

Check out Haven and apply online at haven coliving

We offer month-to-month, no-lease/no-commitment, completely furnished shared rooms with an awesome list of amenities plus weekly activities for all our members where you are always invited, yet never obligated. 

We have four large common areas with comfy sectional couches, big-screen TVs, fast WIFI, HBO, Netflix, Hulu, etc. We also have a gym, yoga room, co-working space, theater room, weekly workout classes, biweekly vegan dinners, daily cleaning of all common areas, monthly lecture series, and plenty more. Outside, we have a recreation area with a yoga deck, rooftop lounge, barbecue, and outdoor meditation area!

We are selective about who we let in... No negative people.
EVERYONE has a full criminal background check

Please be ready to inspire and be inspired by the other like-minded people!

Sign up to check out our house and apply online at Haven Coliving, or call and ask for James Haven Coliving - Penmar is an apartment community located in Los Angeles County and the 90291 ZIP Code. This area is served by the Los Angeles Unified attendance zone. Unique Features
